item.title: My Journey to 3x Faster Builds: Trimming Barrel File Imports
item.description: I maintain a small frontend application (4K LOC) which uses Vite as the compiler. The production build, using npm run build, was taking 26 secs on Github Actions. It seemed awfully slow for such a small application. I decided to investigate why.
